name: Other Spaces
description: Other buildings and spaces excluding parks and nightlife
query:
SELECT * from planet_osm_polygon WHERE
    amenity != 'club'
    AND amenity != 'nightclub'
    AND amenity != 'pub'
    AND amenity != 'stripclub'
    AND amenity != 'casino'
    AND amenity != 'bar'
    AND amenity != 'music_venue'
    AND amenity != 'restaurant_bar'
    AND amenity != 'restaurant'
    and amenity!='gardens'
    and amenity!='square'
    and amenity!='green'
    and amenity!='garden'
    and leisure!='garden'
    and leisure!='park'
    and leisure!='open_space'
    and leisure!='recreation_ground'
    and leisure!='sports_ground'
    and leisure!='dog_park'
    and leisure!='sports_ground'
    and leisure!='scrub'
